meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Karen O'Donnell Hunter Sandison Ben Ingram Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6644.

td.p: Karen O'Donnell, a website manager from Washington, D.C.
Hunter Sandison, a camera operator from Los Angeles, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,200)
Ben Ingram, an IT consultant originally from Florence, South Carolina (whose 3-day cash winnings total $53,230)

tr.td: WHAT'S ON YOUR iPOD?
2 COMPLETELY UNRELATED ITEMS
RHYME TIME
HAPPY BIRTHDAY!
ANATOMICALLY CORRECT
POLITICALLY INCORRECT
(Alex: You have to identify the president who is speaking.)

Karen
